Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM.synopsis: Dialog with harpers in Danthelon's Dancing Axe basement ambush. A number of doppelgangers have slaughered a Harper troop and stolen their faces, forcing the one surviving Harper to set Jaheira up for an ambush.OOM version of this dialog that were made after the splitting of WYR_Axe_Harpers dialog.
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main.Teleport to larian://bookmark?name=BGO_DanthelonDancingAxe_Basement&mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-20.376675;45.939648;125.109711&camTarget=-19.833111;45.491306;125.819305Talk to any of npcs as Jaheira without the Avatar being present.

Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_2.speaker: Harper Geraldus
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_2.text: High Harper. May Selûne's Tears shine on this meeting.
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hesitant, nervous - stressing the words 'Selune'sTears' as a code and hoping we understand.InternalNodeContext: Jaheira in party, player doesn't know harpers are doppelgangers.

Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_4.speaker: Hemm
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_4.text: The lad's a little nervous, Jaheira. We heard of your great victory against Ketheric.
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harper Chelvin steps up beside Geraldus, taking control of the conversation.

Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_5.speaker: Narrator
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_5.text: *Geraldus isn't nervous, he's terrified - and for good reason. 'Selûne's Tears' is an old Harper code meant to indicate an ambush by impostors.*

Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_6.speaker: Jaheira
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_6.text: He can relax, then. He has nothing to fear from me. But you -

Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Jaheira draws her weapons (if Bronze anims ONLY)

Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_0.speaker: Jaheira
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_0.text: You should have studied Chelvin before you stole her face. She wasn't much of a smiler.

Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_3.speaker: Hemm
Harpers_OM_Jaheira_OOM_3.text: Maybe not in your company, Harper. But after I gave her to Orin's blades, I promise you - she was smiling from ear to ear.
